s.text: The WP waits until the second-to-last.
According to the WP , executives at Mobil and Exxon forgot one thing while they were crafting their merger into the world's largest corporation: to register their new corporate Internet address.
According to the WP , executives at Mobil and Exxon forgot one thing while they were crafting their merger into the world's largest corporation: to register their new corporate Internet address.
According to the WP , executives at Mobil and Exxon forgot one thing while they were crafting their merger into the world's largest corporation: to register their new corporate Internet address.
The story off-leads at the WP , but in a sure sign of scandal fatigue, it's below the fold at USAT and the LAT , and runs inside at the NYT .

Since there is no dispute that Espy received some $35,000 worth of goods and bennies from parties with interests before Agriculture and since some of those parties pleaded guilty to making illegal gifts, it's easy for the reader to wonder how the clean-sweep verdict was possible.
Which, the LAT adds, he declined to do.
